item.title: Ned for months / years and need to be removed urgently., 5th December
item.description:
The silver & red cars are on east side of Lulworth road between Crewys and Wroxton. The black VW Sharan is in front of 1 Wroxton Roadaround the corner from Lulworth. They have blocked off parking and electric charging facility for other road users and residents for literally years. A met police officer said that these cars have been abandoned there by car repair outfits near by and one or two of them do not have owners. The two, red and silver, are not taxed and do not have MOT certificates. They should not be on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wroxton Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed with no warning signage, 5th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hornsey Park Road, Hornsey, Greater London

item.title: Dumped fridge freezer, 5th December
item.description:
This has been dumped by the tenants at 22 Townshend close, it’s been outside in the close for a week and today they have dragged it and dumped it outside the close across the pavement leaving no walking access’s. This would have all been caught on cctv.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Watery Lane, Greater London

item.title: Remains of bike dumped on pavement, 5th December
item.description:
